content: - balaheenarum, paapikalumaaya njangalutemel anugrahangalum karunayum randu lokangalilum ennu mennekkum choriyappetumaaraakaname. Aammeen.

items.content: /tpattakkaaran:- njangalute kartthaavum dyvavume! Ninte maathaavineyum, ellaa parishuddhanmaareyum, shuddhamathikaleyum, ee neram thirusannidhiyil njangal smarikkunnu. Avarute praarththanaasahaayangalaal njangale kaatthukollaname. Avarute punyajeevithatthe anukarippaanum, avareppole ninakku ishtanmaaraakuvaanum njangale sahaayikkaname. Njangal ninakkum ninte pithaavinum parishuddhaathmaavinum sthuthiyum sthothravum samarppikkum. Hosho ... Aammeen.

content:
yaachikkunnu
njangalotoppam njangalkkaayu praarththikkuka nee
nrupapathi savidham
shamavum shaanthiyum ulakengum vaazhattathinaal
sadayam nee- kkitatte
sakala nivaa-sangalil ni-
nnarishatthin dandam.
- kaarunyavaanaaya kartthaave! Njangalotu karuna cheythu njangale sahaayikkaname.
pattakkaaran:- (men aaloho nkaabel) dyvatthil ninnu katangalkku parihaaravum, paapangalkku mochanavum, randu lokangalilum ennekkum naam kykkollumaaraakatte. Aammeen.

naathane vaazhtthuvinutthamare
parimaladhoopayutham-dyvatthin janani
kanyakamariyaami-nnormma bhavikkatte.

mariyaamin smaranam-varadaayaka' maaka
thalpraarththana njangal-kkaathmaavinu kotta.

bhaagyam nibiyarkkum-bhaagyam shleeharkkum
bhaagyam sahaderkkum-punaruththaana dine.

Mashihaaye kaanmaan-kaamkshicchoru sahader
vaalaal chirakukal poondunnathu padameri.

Balaheenatha neekki - thuna cheyyuka naathaa!
Raapakalatiyangal-kkaashrayamangallo.

vaanilu moozhi yiledanilum-haaleluyyaa
dayaraa devaagaarangali-lellaatatthum
kanyakamariyaaminnundaakatte nallormma.
Nirmmalamaam kanyaathvatthil -thiruvulamaarnnu
raajaadheeshanirangivasicchaval thannudaratthil
/tbhoovisvargge - thalsmruthi valaratte
/tkottayathaayu praarththana theeratte;
naathaa! Cherkkuka njangale nin maathru-smaranatthil

vaarum nirmmalakanyaka thannudaratthil
hithamotudayam cheythoru dyvasuthaa! Sthothram the.
Karnna tthaalavane kyykko-ndudare peri.
Garbhaashaya kanyaamudrakaleennum nirggathanaayu
/tjaathikale-lajjaakularaakki
/tsthuthiyadhikam-thaazhcha varicchone!
Naranaayu raksha kotutthavane! Sabha keertthikkunnu.

praarththippin shleehanmaare! Kartthaavotaayu
bhinnatha sabha than santhaanangalili-llaathaavaan.
Ningalathil cholliyathaakum-vishvaasatthe
maayicchituvaan-dusthaarkkikarathine chuttunnu.
/tsathyamathaam-mooshayilaavachanam
/tkanakam pol-shodhiccheetatte.
Vydikar vaazhtthum, shuddhasabhaykkudayam chertthone.

Krooshinmel thalachaayicchon -valabhaagatthaayu
muti mutayunnathu kandappol sahadevanmaar ningal
naanaavidha yaathana' yeyum-koositaathe
galarudhiru tthaal dhavalima amgangal-kkulavaakki
/tpeedakale venniha mashihaaye
/tsnehicchor -dhanyanmaar ningal
bhoosvarggangalilerunnu smaranam- ningalkkaayu.

aahvaanam cheyyunnuthavi' -kketthuka naathaa!
Kalahippikkunnulakatthe dushtan-vanchanayaal
bhinnatha nrupa vidhikartthaakkali-lavanulavaakki
dhaarmmikareyum veezhippaan vazhi no-kkeetunnu.
/tkartthaave! Nin karunayilenye
/tsanketham-njangalkkengulloo?
Dushtane njangalil ninnotikkuka nin-sleebaayaal.

Nyaayaadhipanyaayaadhipathe angekkarisham
cherttha katatthaalen thala thaazhttharuthe-vidhigehe
mochanayogyathayillenkilu-mennilirikkum
ninthirumeyyum rakthavumortthenmel krupacheythu.
/tninsnehaal-sleebaa njaan kooppi;
/tpizhapokki-nin meyu rudhirangal.
Hithamotu karunaamayaneesho, mama' -nalkuka mukthi.

Khedam vendaa mashihaayil mruthi poondore!
Aasannam prathiphalamekum punaruththaanadinam.
Ketenye kabarukaleennum ningalezhunne
ttathivegam raajaathmajane' ethirelppaanetthum.
/tmahimaavin neeraalam' chaartthi
/tthirumumpil sthuthipaatum ningal
kanivaalaadaam sutha jeevapradane -krupa cheythu.

makkalilappan krupa cheythathu pole-haa-haa
bhakthanmaaril dyvam krupa cheyyum.
/tpullinu thulyam naranute naalkalaho-haa-haa
/tpookkunnithu vayalil pooccheti pole.

sharanatthaale nin krupayil
maranamatanjoru daasare nin
jeevasvaramathunartthaname
kabareennudyaanatthinnaayu

naathaa thaavaka mirulokam;
ninnadhikaaram thaanengum
sleebaayaal jeevitha kaata
tthanpaal mukthi mrutharkkeka.

sthothram! Mruthajeevapradane!
Kabareennetteetunnone,
nin prekshakathaathanum mamalan
roohaaykkum haaleluyyaa.

maathruvishuddha smruthi sambandham nalkuka naathaa!
Thal praarththanayaal punyamivarkkum mrutharaayorkkum.

Daaveeduputhri! Bhoopaalare neekkum bhoopankal
svaathanthuryam the kaanmathinaale yaachikkunnu.

Kallara-vaasam cheyyum-mruthare-netuka dhyryam
thal sa-ndesham-kelppin-savidham punaruththaanam

bhaagyavathikkum siddharkkum mrutharaam bhaktharkkum
smruthi uyaratthilumee sabhayilumundaayeetatte.

shuddhan nee aaloho
shuddhan nee balavaana
krooshettone! Mruthiheenaa parishuddhan nee krupa cheytheetaname.
(moonnu praavashyam)

naathaa! Krupa cheytheetaname.
Naathaa! Kanivaal krupa cheytha
naathaa! Karmmavumarththanakalu-mettittavayaal krupa cheytheetaname.

Sthothram the deveshaa!
Sthothram the srashtaava
sthothram paapikalatiyaaril-krupa cheytheetum mashihaaraajaave!
